Package remodel.meta

Class UpdatingRule

java.lang.Object
remodel.meta.Nominal
remodel.meta.Property
remodel.meta.Operation
remodel.meta.Rule
remodel.meta.UpdatingRule
public class UpdatingRule
extends Rule
UpdatingRule is a transformation rule that updates the source and returns this as the target. The result of an UpdatingRule is not cached.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Anthony J H Simons
